title: Brazilian Medical Association
text:
The Brazilian Medical Association () founded in 1951, is the national class association of <a href="physician">physician</a>s in <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. With more than 140,000 associates, is the second largest in the <a href="Americas">Americas</a>, just after the <a href="American%20Medical%20Association">American Medical Association</a>.
Its official <a href="medical%20journal">journal</a>, "Revista da Associação Médica Brasileira" (), is published by <a href="Elsevier">Elsevier</a>.
